jello


Ingredients

Cooking Instructions

Mix gelatin powders together in a heat-proof bowl. Add
boiling water; stir until dissolved. Stir in vodka and peach
schnapps. Pour mixture into little cups; chill until set,
about 4 hours.
Source 

https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/275057/sex-on-the-beach-jell-o-shots/ 

Reference Video
